pages.text: $(mod)Macaw's mods$() add a large variety of building blocks to use.$(br2)From the names of the mods, it should hopefully be obvious what each adds. If not, you can search "@macaw" in REI to see for yourself.

Of Macaw's mods, this pack has: $(mod)$(li)Macaw's Windows$(li)Macaw's Windows Additions$(li)Macaw's Bridges$(li)Macaw's Trapdoors$(li)Macaw's Fences and Walls$(li)Macaw's Roofs$(li)Macaw's Furniture$(li)Macaw's Paths and Pavings$(li)Macaw's Lights and Lamps
